body:
Price +3,750 gp

Aura faint transmutation

CL 5th

Weight &mdash

This suit of armor helps its wearer remain mounted and in control of his mount. The wearer gains a +5 competence bonus on Ride skill checks.
name: Jousting
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Armor Special Abilities/Magic Armor and Shield Special Ability Descriptions/Jousting

sections.body:
descriptor Cost +1,875 gp

descriptor

Craft Magic Arms and Armor, creator must have 5 ranks in Ride
